alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 10 at 2:51AM MST until November 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Falling and blowing snow will create near whiteout conditions. Hikers, hunters and snow mobilers could easily become disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
